body_html:
Hi,
I have cuda installed folders such as: cuda, cuda-7.0, cuda-7.5, all they under this path /usr/local/. I copy cudnn r2, r3, r4 in all folders:cuda, cuda-7.0, cuda-7.5, but this did not work? how to check my tensorflow actually use which version of cudnn and cuda?

body:
Hi,
I have cuda installed folders such as: cuda, cuda-7.0, cuda-7.5, all they under this path /usr/local/. I copy cudnn r2, r3, r4 in all folders:cuda, cuda-7.0, cuda-7.5, but this did not work? how to check my tensorflow actually use which version of cudnn and cuda?
